structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Fees not authorized to be changed.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 64.480 to 64.740 is intended to change or to authorize any public officer or body to change the amount or rate of any fee or percentage prescribed by law, it being the intention of KRS 64.480 to 64.740, with respect to officers receiving compensation from fees or percentages, to fix or provide for the fixing of the maximum compensation that may be received by the officer, and not the sources of such compensation.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 19.
